content.question: In creating the work shown, Michel Tuffery used

choices.label: flattened metal cans that were joined together with rivets
cast brass that was molded into shape by using a lost-wax method
molded porcelain that was painted with different colored glazes
cloth that was soaked in resin and painted once hardened

content.answer: flattened metal cans that were joined together with rivets

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
